learning_objective: Create computational models that represent the relationships among different elements of data collected from a phenomenon or process.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Ash is trying to write a code to calculate the base-10 logarithm of a number. They have written a code that already allows for calculating the exponent of a number. Here is their current code:What is the output on line 4 when n = 1000?",
    "Answer1": "1",
    "Answer2": "2",
    "Answer3": "3",
    "Answer4": "4",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "The base-10 logarithm of a number x is the power to which the number 10 must be raised to obtain the number x. In this case, line 4 wants to print the base-10 logarithm of 1000 which is 3 because 10^3 equals 1000.",
    "code_snippet": "integer n = 1000\n// Calculate the exponent of n\ninteger e = 1\nwhile n > 10\n    n = n / 10\n    e = e + 1\nend\n// Print the exponent\noutput e"
}
